page.title: 20NAIRN:A DAY IN THE LIFE OF..
page.content: I am 12 years old. On school days I get up at 8 o'clock, wash and put on my school uniform.I go downstairs to the kitchen where I have a plate of Frosties for breakfast. I brush my hair, collect my schoolbag and walk to school which I reach at 8.45am.I sit with my friends until the bell rings at 9.00 for registration.Then I have 2 classes before break when I sit in the concourse with my friends.I buy crisps from the tuck shop and go for a walk. After 2 more classes it is lunchtime when I have chips and coke to eat.Two more classes and it is 3.50 and time for home. At home I change and do any homework then usually go downtown to the shops. At 6.00 the familly sit down for a meal and in the evening I watch TV, listen to records or finish my work.
